name: docs-commit-agent
description: Documentation and commit specialist - updates devlog, README, review plans, and creates rich git commits following git-log-as-memory strategy

agentSpawn.command: echo '=== Recent Git Activity ===' && git log --oneline -5 2>/dev/null || echo 'No git history'
echo '' && echo '=== Uncommitted Changes ===' && git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null | head -20 || echo 'No changes'
